text:
*NODEJS - HubSpot CLIENT*
Is there any documentation listing methods and endpoints that have already been implemented for this client ?

Only thing I know of is the release changelog: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs/releases> - But furthermore the client explicitly supports non implemented calls: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs#not-wrapped-endpoints>. But you should be able to make a good guess if you look at the code generation (<https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs/tree/master/codegen>), the Sample apps (<https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs/tree/master/sample-apps>) and the already implemented tests (Search for all dockerfiles).
Hi everyone - does anyone know if we can do a similar thing with Drift/Intercom that Lattice does here: <http://lattice.com/>
where if you respond to the drift bot identifying that you need support it triggers the Intercom bot to open
